aboutpara: Hi! I'm Moises Rodr√≠guez Bola√±os, a passionate Software Developer specialized in full stack mobile and web development. I love building clean, efficient, and scalable solutions that make an impact.With a background in Computer Systems Engineering, I‚Äôve developed and maintained apps using technologies like Flutter, Kotlin (Jetpack Compose), Vue.js, JavaScript, Java, PHP, and Node.js. Whether it's a cross-platform mobile app or a complex web system, I enjoy taking projects from concept to production.My approach blends solid engineering principles with a deep understanding of user experience and product goals. I‚Äôm always exploring new tools, improving my skills, and looking for better ways to solve problems..

resume.description: Computer Systems Engineer with experience in full stack development for mobile and web applications. Focused on delivering efficient, scalable solutions with a strong emphasis on user experience, and adept at collaborating in multidisciplinary teams and adapting to new technological challenges.

experiences.position: Full Stack Developer at Abarrotera Hidalgo de Tehuac√°n SA de CV

sections.title: Summary
bullets: As a versatile software developer, I have contributed to multiple stages of the development process‚Äîfrom backend architecture and database design to frontend development and user experience design. I have worked on both web and mobile platforms, implementing responsive interfaces and integrating APIs using modern technologies like Vue.js, Flutter, and Jetpack Compose. I emphasize clean code, performance optimization, and creating intuitive user experiences across devices.

sections.title: Responsabilities
bullets: Developed and maintained backend applications using PHP, implementing business logic and MySQL database structures according to project requirements.
Designed relational database schemas optimized for performance and scalability.
Built simple and functional APIs to enable communication between the frontend (e.g., Vue.js with Pinia) and the backend.
Collaborated on the design and development of user-centered interfaces using Figma, with a strong focus on usability, accessibility, and visual experience.
Contributed to technical decisions regarding code organization, project structure, and data flow, especially in mobile projects using Flutter/Dart, Jetpack Compose (Kotlin), and Swift UI.
Implemented native mobile features with Java and Kotlin for Android, and Swift for iOS, ensuring consistency and high performance across platforms.
Supported debugging, bug fixing, and performance optimization in both web and mobile applications.

sections.title: Challenges & Solutions
sections.description: One of my most complex challenges was building a kiosk-mode Android application using Device Owner APIs to enhance control over the smartphones. This app needed to function as the primary launcher, fully lock or suspend the device. Solution:
bullets: Implemented full device lockdown and kiosk mode toggle, using Android‚Äôs DevicePolicyManager APIs.
Developed real-time location tracking, and notification capture features that store data securely on a remote server.
Enabled automatic media backup (images, videos, files) to the server using scoped storage and background services.
Integrated Socket.IO to establish real-time communication with a custom MDM platform built in Node.js (although my role was focused solely on the Android client).
Scheduled background tasks using WorkManager to ensure reliability and persistence across reboots and network changes.
